about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Travel Partner
about.description: We passionately create unforgettable travel experiences. Our team of experts strives to make every journey special.
about.missionText: To provide exceptional travel experiences that inspire and connect people with the most beautiful corners of the world.
about.visionText: To be the leading travel company known for innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction.

hero.subtitle: For 7 years we have been creating unforgettable travel experiences for Lithuanians. Our mission is to help you discover the beauty of the world safely and comfortably.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Koradius Travel was born from a passion for travel and a desire to help Lithuanians discover the beauty of the world. Founded in 2017 as a small travel agency, we dreamed of creating a service that would be tailored specifically to Lithuanian needs.
story.paragraph2: Over 7 years, we have grown into a reliable travel partner specializing not only in regular holidays but also in medical tourism. We are particularly proud that our services are adapted for older people - we understand your needs and care about comfort at every step.
story.paragraph3: Today we have sent more than 5000 Lithuanians on trips and continue to grow while maintaining a personal approach to each client. Our goal is not just to sell a trip, but to create an unforgettable experience.

customerCare.title: Customer Care
customerCare.description: Every customer is important to us. We strive to understand your needs and create the perfect journey, especially considering the needs of older people.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: 7 years in the market have proven our reliability. We guarantee quality and safety in all trips. We have all the necessary certificates and insurance.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: We have a wide network of partners around the world and know the best offers. Our team regularly travels and checks service quality.

support24_7.title: 24/7 Support
support24_7.description: We are available at any time of day to help solve any questions during your trip. We have an emergency helpline.

ltkia.title: LTKIA Member
ltkia.description: Member of the Lithuanian Tourism and Travel Agencies Association since 2017

iata.title: IATA Agent
iata.description: Accredited agent of the International Air Transport Association

etoa.title: ETOA Member
etoa.description: Member of the European Tour Operators Association

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create unforgettable travel experiences for every client, especially considering the needs of older people. To provide the highest quality services, ensuring safety, comfort and personal approach.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading travel agency in Lithuania, known for exceptional customer service, reliability and innovative solutions. To help every Lithuanian discover the beauty of the world and create unforgettable memories.

location.title: Our Office
location.description: Visit our office in the center of Vilnius

responseTime.question: How quickly do you respond to inquiries?
responseTime.answer: We respond to emails within 2-4 hours on business days. By phone - immediately.

appointment.question: Can I come without a prior appointment?
appointment.answer: Yes, but we recommend making an appointment in advance so we can allocate enough time.

language.question: Do you provide consultations in Lithuanian?
language.answer: Yes, all our specialists speak Lithuanian and understand the needs of older people.

tripChanges.question: Can I change trip details?
tripChanges.answer: Yes, depending on the type of trip and time. Contact us for details.

payment.question: What payment options do you have?
payment.answer: We accept cash, cards, bank transfers and installment payments.

insurance.question: Do you have insurance?
insurance.answer: Yes, we have all the necessary insurance and are LTKIA members.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for unforgettable travel experiences
